DOC.brief_summary: A phase 2 study to find out if the drug INCB018424 Phosphate Cream is safe and has beneficial effects in people who have alopecia areata (partial or complete hair loss) when applied to the skin.
DOC.brief_title: A Study With INCB018424 Phosphate Cream Applied Topically to Subjects With Alopecia Areata (AA)
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of AA Duration and extent of current episode of AA Evidence of active hair loss Evidence of diffuse, spontaneous terminal hair regrowth Receipt of treatment known to potentially affect the course of AA within last month
